metadata.title: CVE-2023-0450 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from8.1 to 15.8.5, and from 15.9 to 15.9.4, and from 15.10 to 15.10.1. It waspossible to add a branch with an ambiguous name that could be used tosocial engineer users.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
